review_reason: forward_F and backward_P in DovetailingChain.lean are mathematically unprovable for the current linear chain construction. All alternative approaches (Nat.unpair, witness graph embedding, Zorn) have the same fundamental gap: F-formulas do not persist through GContent seeds. Resolution requires a new BFMCS construction (omega-squared, witness-graph-guided chain, or Zorn with F/P invariant), each estimated at 15-30 hours. This is beyond the scope of Task 916 and requires a new task.

artifacts.summary: WitnessGraph.lean: 0 sorries, 0 errors. Proved forward_G/backward_H (Phase 5A), removed 2 mathematically impossible sorry'd theorems (Phases 5B/5C), added analysis documentation.
Updated sorry count documentation (4->2) and forward_F/backward_P docstrings with detailed mathematical blocker analysis.
Updated sorry count documentation to reflect current state (2 sorries, not 4).
Implementation summary covering all phases through Phase 6 BLOCKED analysis

partial_progress.details: Phase 6 BLOCKED: forward_F and backward_P are mathematically unprovable for any linear chain construction. The fundamental issue is that F-formulas (F(psi) = neg(G(neg(psi)))) do not persist through GContent seeds, and Lindenbaum extensions can introduce G(neg(psi)) at any step. WitnessGraph.lean has proven local witness existence but cannot be integrated into a linear BFMCS. Resolution requires a new non-linear construction estimated at 15-30 hours.

errors.message: forward_F/backward_P cannot be proven for the linear chain construction in DovetailingChain.lean due to F-formula non-persistence through GContent seeds
errors.recommendation: Create a new task for one of: (1) omega-squared construction (20-30h), (2) witness-graph-guided chain (15-25h), (3) Zorn with F/P invariant (15-20h)

completion_data.completion_summary: WitnessGraph.lean: eliminated all 4 sorries (2 by proof, 2 by removal of unprovable theorems). DovetailingChain.lean: updated documentation to reflect correct sorry count (2, not 4) and added mathematical blocker analysis for forward_F/backward_P. Phase 6 (integration) is BLOCKED: no existing construction can satisfy all four BFMCS properties simultaneously.

DovetailingChain.lean.note: Sorries are mathematically unprovable for this construction; documented with blocker analysis
